Hi, I'm Gianluca
I'm a Software Craftsman*

...and she's my lovely wife Jessica

*Read the Software Craftsmanship's Manifesto

My speciality is iOS & OS X development but in my spare time I also like to play with Ruby, HTML, CSS and JavaScript. By day I work as an independent contractor under my limited company, Cocoa Beans, and by night I work on personal projects.

Feel free to get in touch to discuss how I can help your team develop great apps!
Don't forget to have a look at my blog too!
